pages.text: $(li)The Beach is a small biome composed of mostly of Sand a Water.$(br)$(li)In this place you can find some aquatic vegetation, like Seagrass and animals like Seagulls, Lobsters, Crabs, or Squids too.
$(li)You can search this biome introducing the word $(l)Beach$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
